name: petal pusher - teal
description: these are another version of fabric flower pins, a little less funky than the posies, but very pretty!  these petal pushers are made with layers and layers of ruffles, finished off in the back with a silver bar pin, and now also with a silver alligator clip so you can add it to your hair!  looks great on a shirt, coat, dress, purse, or even tucked into an updo or on a low ponytail.  measures about 3 1/2 inches across. *please note clip in back is smaller than pictured*

name: petal drop necklace - french cut 279
description:
these necklaces are a fun collaboration between my friend and i, and so fun to wear!
each necklace is handmade and unique, featuring our favorite swatches of fabric behind beautiful chandelier crystals.  we contrasted the glitzy crystals with an antiqued copper chain, with a small turquoise glass bead dangling from the end. the chain is 26 inches long and completely adjustable - it can be worn long and low or up higher on the neckline... or anywhere in between!  each necklace comes in a muslin drawstring bag, perfect for gifting.  not water resistant. large petal drop measures 2 inches long, french cut petal drop measures 2 1/2 inches long.

name: zippered pouch - modern mint
description:
zippered pouch:
- designer prints lined with coordinating fabric
- has a flat base and interfaced fabric to help the small bag sit up
- measures at about 5 x 7 inches

uses:
- makeup bag
- money pouch
- grab-n-go bag
- tiny toiletry bag
- receipt/coupon holder
- snack bag for little kiddos
- use at the gym for keys, gym card and ipod
- ...so many possibilities!

name: wristlet clutch - modern mint
description: this wristlet clutch is a great size for a grab-n-go bag, a quick shopping trip, or a date night! it is heavily reinforced with interfacing to be a sturdy yet feminine bag at 11" wide by 5 1/2" high, with a boxed base of about 2". this petite bag can easily fit a wallet, phone, sunglasses, checkbook cover, and all sorts of little goodies. one interior pocket and a zipper closure.

name: infinity cowl scarf - tiny hearts on black *SOLD*
description: these are the coziest of scarves!  they can be worn for fashion or function, or both!  wear them loose with 2 loops around your neck or bundle up with 3 loops to keep away the chill.  measures approximately 2 yards x 9" wide.

name: mini messenger bag - gold rush
description:
i am so excited by this new size of messenger bag!  this was inspired by my teenage niece who wanted a smaller bag to carry her writing supplies in.  so i made the mini messenger bag exactly like the regular messenger bags, all the same bells and whistles, but with a more compact size. 
 :: measures at 15 1/2 wide x 11" tall
:: durable heavy weight fabric
:: long single strap to be worn messenger style - bag hits above the hip
:: 3 interior pockets, fitting a phone, a pen and misc.
:: a small loop inside for hanging your keys from so they're never lost again!
:: extra padded to protect your most valuable items
:: stiff removable base to help keep the bottom flat
:: magnetic snap closure

the gold fabric will distress over time, adding character to the piece.

name: petal pusher - houndstooth
description: these are the newest version of fabric flower pins, a little less funky than the posies, but very pretty!  these petal pushers are made of one solid fabric in layers and layers of ruffles, finished off in the back with a silver bar pin.  looks great on a shirt, coat, dress, purse, or even attached to a hair elastic on a ponytail.  measures about 3 1/2 inches across.

name: wet bag - alphabet
description:
this bag is so multi-functional!  at approximately 10" x 7 1/2", it is quite roomy with a flat bottom, but small enough to still tuck inside another bag.  with gorgeous exterior fabric and wipeable fabric on the base and interior, this bag is not only a hard worker, its pretty, too!  here are just a few ideas for use:
- toss wet swim suits inside
- hide soiled baby clothes until you can get home
- great addition for cloth diaperers
- toss messy snacks in, then toss in your purse, worry free
- use as a toiletry bag, for all your lotions and shampoos
- potty training must have for when you're out and about

*please note:  the wet bags have a dark brown zipper rather than the white one pictured.

name: messenger bag - yellow chevron w/sash
description:
this newer version of the messenger bag has even more bells and whistles!  this is one versatile bag! measuring at ~19" wide and 11" deep, with a 4" wide base, it has a very spacious interior.  this is wide enough for a 17" laptop, and room to spare for all your daily necessities.  this would also be great as a diaper bag!
:: features a removable sash! can be tied in a bow, knot, or taken off completely
:: durable heavy weight fabric
:: long single strap to be worn messenger style, easier for carrying heavier items, like a laptop - bag hits at about the hip
:: 3 interior pockets, fitting a phone, a pen and misc.
:: a small loop inside for hanging your keys from so they're never lost again!
:: extra padded to protect your most valuable items
:: would also work great as an everyday bag, with room to toss in your camera!
:: *new*  stiff removable base to help keep the bottom flat
:: *new*  now includes a magnetic snap closure!

name: bloom belt - 133
description: these one of a kind belts are handmade and back with a felt loop that can be worn on the white grosgrain ribbon sash it comes with, or can be transferred to your favorite belt.  the ribbon sashes are ~ 75" long and can be tied in a bow in the back, on the side, or simply knotted on the side.  these belts are perfect for accessorizing a simple plain t and jeans outfit, or dressing up a simple dress for a special occasion.

name: scrappy bunting - modern christmas
description:
a little bunting for a lot for fun!  these scraps of fabric in all sorts of fun colors and prints will perk up your mantle or windows or whatever you want!  each bunting is made with cotton prints and stitched together in a super long 4 yard strand.  yes, FOUR YARDS!  the bunting can be cut in smaller pieces if need to use in multiple areas - just snip the threads!  each piece of fabric varies in size, but is on average 2.5" wide and 1.5-3" tall.
*this set has modern christmas colors (red, green, pink, lime, turquoise and white)*

name: scrappy bunting - traditional christmas
description:

name: scrappy bunting - pink
description: a little bunting for a lot for fun!  these scraps of fabric in all sorts of fun pinks and prints will perk up your mantle or windows or whatever you want!  each bunting is made with cotton prints and stitched together in a super long 4 yard strand.  yes, FOUR YARDS!  the bunting can be cut in smaller pieces if need to use in multiple areas - just snip the threads!  each piece of fabric varies in size, but is on average 2" wide and 1.5-3" tall.

name: scrappy bunting - neutrals
description: a little bunting for a lot for fun!  these scraps of fabric in neutral whites and creams will perk up your mantle or windows or whatever you want!  each bunting is made with cotton prints and stitched together in a super long 4 yard strand.  yes, FOUR YARDS!  the bunting can be cut in smaller pieces if need to use in multiple areas - just snip the threads!  each piece of fabric varies in size, but is on average 2" wide and 1.5-3" tall.  ends are not finished in any way to prevent raveling - i love frayed edges!

name: scrappy bunting - patriotic
description:
a little bunting for a lot for fun!  this bunting is very patriotic, in all red, white and blue prints, and will perk up your mantle or windows or whatever you want!  each bunting is made with cotton prints and stitched together in a super long 4 yard strand.  yes, FOUR YARDS!  the bunting can be cut in smaller pieces if need to use in multiple areas - just snip the threads!  these are great for memorial day, labor day, 4th of july, and homecomings!

each length of bunting is unique!  some contain light blue/aqua pieces, some just red, white and blue.  you'll love them all!

this diaper clutch is a great addition to a diaper bag or purse!  
- 2 open interior pockets
- it easily holds a travel wipes case and 2-4 diapers, depending on size
- adjustable velcro closure
- wrist strap to carry to the changing table
- snap on the wrist strap so it can be easily attached to a stroller handle
- machine washable

name: foldover clutch - green chevron
description:
this foldover clutch is such a great accessory that is so versatile!
it can be used as a clutch by day or night, but can also fit your e-reader or even an ipad!  while it is not quite as padded as our e-reader cases or ipad cases, it still is well padded for protection.
- clutch can be folded over, or used at full size for a variety of uses
- quality craftsmanship with topstitching details
- finished off with a fun leather tassel zipper pull
- measures approximately 11" tall x 10" wide

name: ipad case - turquoise damask
description:
this case features:
- double thick padding, for extra protection
- double ruffles, for extra cuteness ;)
- measures approximately 8 1/2" x 10"

i opted for the flap rather than a zipper so the ipad screen doesn't get scratched when it is slid in and out.

this case could also fit e-readers, with a little extra wiggle room.  with the added security of the flap, the e-reader would be nice and secure, with maybe a little room for a notepad.

name: market tote - b & w stripe
description: this is a fun bag in the pleated poppy line!  it is a flat hanging bag with 2 synthetic leather shoulder straps and detailed base corners.  i love the contrast of the black & white with the bright turquoise polka dots on the interior!  the bag closes with a magnetic snap and has a divided large interior pocket to hold your phone, pen and other goodies.  measures 12 1/2" x 13 1/2"  and is fully lined with a padded interior to protect your goodies!

name: market tote - brick wood fern
description: this is a fun new bag just added to the pleated poppy line!  it is a flat hanging bag with 2 synthetic leather shoulder straps and detailed base corners.  i love the contrast of the black & white with the bright turquoise polka dots on the interior!  the bag closes with a magnetic snap and has a divided large interior pocket to hold your phone, pen and other goodies.  measures 12 1/2" x 13 1/2"  and is fully lined with a padded interior to protect your goodies!

name: messenger bag - chocolate brown chevron w/ sash
description:
this newer version of the messenger bag has even more bells and whistles!this is one versatile bag! measuring at ~21" wide and 11" deep, with a 4" wide base, it has a very spacious interior.  this is wide enough for a 17" laptop, and room to spare for all your daily necessities.  this would also be great as a diaper bag!
:: features a removable sash! can be tied in a bow, knot, or taken off completely
:: durable heavy weight fabric
:: long single strap to be worn messenger style, easier for carrying heavier items, like a laptop - bag hits at about the hip
:: 3 interior pockets, fitting a phone, a pen and misc.
:: a small loop inside for hanging your keys from so they're never lost again!
:: extra padded to protect your most valuable items
:: would also work great as an everyday bag, with room to toss in your camera!
:: *new*  stiff removable base to help keep the bottom flat
:: *new*  now includes a magnetic snap closure!

name: mini messenger bag - chocolate chevron
description:
i am so excited by this new size of messenger bag!  this was inspired by my teenage niece who wanted a smaller bag to carry her writing supplies in.  so i made the mini messenger bag exactly like the regular messenger bags, all the same bells and whistles, but with a more compact size. 
 :: measures at 15 1/2 wide x 11" tall
:: durable heavy weight fabric
:: long single strap to be worn messenger style - bag hits above the hip
:: 3 interior pockets, fitting a phone, a pen and misc.
:: a small loop inside for hanging your keys from so they're never lost again!
:: extra padded to protect your most valuable items
:: stiff removable base to help keep the bottom flat
:: magnetic snap closure

name: petal drop necklace - large 293
description:
these necklaces are a fun collaboration between my friend and i, and so fun to wear!
each necklace is handmade and unique, featuring our favorite swatches of fabric behind beautiful chandelier crystals.  we contrasted the glitzy crystals with an antiqued copper chain, with a small turquoise glass bead dangling from the end. the chain is 26 inches long and completely adjustable - it can be worn long and low or up higher on the neckline... or anywhere in between!  each necklace comes in a muslin drawstring bag, perfect for gifting.  not water resistant. large petal drop measures 2 inches long, french cut petal drop measures 2 1/2 inches long.

name: petal pusher - cream

name: reusable tote bag - wood grain
description:
our town just placed a ban on plastic bags, so we all get to bring our own shopping bags with to tote our goods home.  if you want to "go green" grab a couple of these bags to put in your purse.  put in your purse?!  what?!  aren't most reusable bags big and bulky?

these bags are designed to roll up nicely (or get shoved) into a small pouch.  the pouch coordinates with the bag fabric and closes with a snap closure.

the pouch is small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, so it will easily fit in your purse!

the bag is designed with 2 handles and a gusseted base for a wider bag.  the body of the bag measures approximately 17" wide x 15".deep.

the bag handles are fully lined for extra stability.

name: ruffled mum pins - 3 colors to choose from!
description: this fabulously fluffy pin is a great addition to my collection of flowers - a pairing of mum, posies and petal pushers together on a coat or scarf would be so pretty!  each mum measures approximately 3" wide and is finished off in the back with a silver bar pin.

name: set of 3 posy pins - 826
description: this is a set of 3 posy pins.  they are layers and ruffle-y layers of fluffy fabric goodness!  pin a single one on a blouse, or pile them high on a jacket, tucked in a scarf, or accenting a hat.  these are great for gifts - give 2 away and keep one for yourself!  each pin is backed with a silver bar pin and is guaranteed to draw compliments!

name: tiny pouch - strawberries
description:
good things come in small packages! this tiny pouch was created to be a coin purse, but also works great as a business card holder, gift card holder, a special place for library cards... lots of fun things!
- measures ~ 3 1/4" x 4 1/4"
- top flap fold over back pocket to securely hold in coins
- closes securely with a snap
- small ribbon loop at the top corner allows you to attach your keys to it for the gym or for a quick run to the store
- has 2 interior pockets

name: wet bag - yellow rings
description:
this bag is so multi-functional!  at approximately 10" x 7 1/2", it is quite roomy with a flat bottom, but small enough to still tuck inside another bag.  with gorgeous exterior fabric and wipeable fabric on the base and interior, this bag is not only a hard worker, its pretty, too!  here are just a few ideas for use:
- toss wet swim suits inside
- hide soiled baby clothes until you can get home
- great addition for cloth diaperers
- toss messy snacks in, then toss in your purse, worry free
- use as a toiletry bag, for all your lotions and shampoos
- potty training must have for when you're out and about

name: wristlet clutch - chocolate damask
description: this wristlet clutch is a great size for a grab-n-go bag, a quick shopping trip, or a date night! it is heavily reinforced with interfacing to be a sturdy yet feminine bag at 11" wide by 5 1/2" high, with a boxed base of about 2". this petite bag can easily fit a wallet, phone, sunglasses, checkbook cover, and all sorts of little goodies. one interior pocket and a zipper closure.

name: zippered pouch - strawberries
description:
zippered pouch:
- designer prints lined with coordinating fabric
- has a flat base and interfaced fabric to help the small bag sit up
- measures at about 5 x 7 inches

uses:
- makeup bag
- money pouch
- grab-n-go bag
- tiny toiletry bag
- receipt/coupon holder
- snack bag for little kiddos
- use at the gym for keys, gym card and ipod
- ...so many possibilities!

name: petal drop necklace - french cut 282 *SOLD*
description:
these necklaces are a fun collaboration between my friend and i, and so fun to wear!
each necklace is handmade and unique, featuring our favorite swatches of fabric behind beautiful chandelier crystals.  we contrasted the glitzy crystals with an antiqued copper chain, with a small turquoise glass bead dangling from the end. the chain is 26 inches long and completely adjustable - it can be worn long and low or up higher on the neckline... or anywhere in between!  each necklace comes in a muslin drawstring bag, perfect for gifting.  not water resistant. large petal drop measures 2 inches long, french cut petal drop measures 2 1/2 inches long.

name: reusable tote bag - bright blue dots (w/abc's)  *SOLD*
description:
our town placed a ban on plastic bags, so we all get to bring our own shopping bags with to tote our goods home.  if you want to "go green" grab a couple of these bags to put in your purse.  put in your purse?!  what?!  aren't most reusable bags big and bulky?

these bags are designed to roll up nicely (or get shoved) into a small pouch.  the pouch coordinates with the bag fabric and closes with a snap closure.

the pouch is small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, so it will easily fit in your purse!

the bag is designed with 2 handles and a gusseted base for a wider bag.  the body of the bag measures approximately 17" wide x 15".deep.

the bag handles are fully lined for extra stability.

description: these scarves are so soft and bouncy (thanks to elastic thread!).  they are functional and a bit fancy, measuring at about 12" wide and about 42" long.

name: scrappy bunting *SOLD*
description: a little bunting for a lot for fun!  these scraps of fabric in all sorts of fun colors and prints will perk up your mantle or windows or whatever you want!  each bunting is made with cotton prints and stitched together in a super long 4 yard strand.  yes, FOUR YARDS!  the bunting can be cut in smaller pieces if need to use in multiple areas - just snip the threads!  each piece of fabric varies in size, but is on average 2" wide and 1.5-3" tall.

name: wet bag - magenta pristine poppies *SOLD*
description:
this bag is so multi-functional!  at approximately 10" x 7 1/2", it is quite roomy with a flat bottom, but small enough to still tuck inside another bag.  with gorgeous exterior fabric and wipeable fabric on the base and interior, this bag is not only a hard worker, its pretty, too!  here are just a few ideas for use:
- toss wet swim suits inside
- hide soiled baby clothes until you can get home
- great addition for cloth diaperers
- toss messy snacks in, then toss in your purse, worry free
- use as a toiletry bag, for all your lotions and shampoos
- potty training must have for when you're out and about
